item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A “meta-optics” camera that is the size of a single grain of salt (75 points | 53 comments)
2. Traits are a local maximum (60 points | 29 comments)
3. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (441 points | 58 comments)
4. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (131 points | 14 comments)
5. Handling cookies is a minefield (435 points | 212 comments)
6. Fern Is Hiring Software Engineers in Brooklyn ( | hide)
7. NeuralDEM – Real-Time Simulation of Industrial Particulate Flows (24 points | 5 comments)
8. A C++ Mixin System (9 points | discuss)
9. Bayesian Neural Networks (174 points | 30 comments)
10. The Birthday Paradox Experiment (56 points | 48 comments)
11. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (192 points | 43 comments)
12. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (238 points | 209 comments)
13. The meme-ification of the “Demon Core” (318 points | 234 comments)
14. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (65 points | 21 comments)
15. WhisperNER: Unified Open Named Entity and Speech Recognition (88 points | 10 comments)
16. Fun with Logitech MX900 Bluetooth receivers (2006) (21 points | 8 comments)
17. Machiavelli and the Emergence of the Private Study (58 points | 11 comments)
18. Interactive Visual Sorting (103 points | 20 comments)
19. Listen to the whispers: web timing attacks that work (153 points | 22 comments)
20. Growing Music: musical interpretations of L-Systems (2023) [pdf] (15 points | 4 comments)
21. Hyrum's Law in Golang (289 points | 176 comments)
22. Code Conversion Language (2019) (102 points | 16 comments)
23. The Tao of Topic Maps (2000) (19 points | 3 comments)
24. Fear, Friendship and the Channel Tunnel (19 points | 3 comments)
25. A Walk with LuaJIT (118 points | 17 comments)
26. Truly portable C applications (19 points | 3 comments)
27. Software-defined (Internet) radio with Liquidsoap (2023) (36 points | 7 comments)
28. Show HN: Bike route planner that follows almost only official bike trails (250 points | 134 comments)
29. Launch HN: Fresco (YC F24) – AI Copilot for Construction Superintendents (72 points | 27 comments)
30. A binary tree of all Pythagorean triples (172 points | 19 comments)
